title: Textile, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, silk foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave with overtwisted yarns (crepe)
description: Left front of bodice, cut on the bias, of black crepe embroidered with black silk in close serpentines of cherry blossoms and stems.
